rows.label: qev042202_MSG0001
rows.name:
Friend has done well to defeat incarnation of
Divine Nopopon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042202_MSG0002
rows.name:
Now Divine Nopopon will bestow further trial upon
promising warrior friend.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042202_MSG0003
rows.name: It will be difficult beyond reason. Fit to shatter souls![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042202_MSG0004
rows.name: Knowing this, does friend still wish to face it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042202_JNK0010
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev042202_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask to undergo the trial.

rows.label: qev042202_JNK0020
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: qev042202_SEL0021
rows.name: Say that you have no interest in these trials.

rows.label: qev042202_MSG0005
rows.name: So be it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042202_MSG0006
rows.name: Divine Nopopon is satisfied with answer of friend.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042202_MSG0007
rows.name:
...Whaaat?! Wait just one second! If friend passes trial,
reward is amazing power![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042202_MSG0008
rows.name:
Besides, if friend leave now, incarnation of Divine
Nopopon just got beat up for nothing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042202_MSG0009
rows.name: That is NOT going to fly![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042202_MSG0010
rows.name: Nope nope...nope...nopopoPOPOPON![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042202_MSG0011
rows.name: Now, will friend face trial?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042202_JNK0030
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev042202_SEL0031
rows.name: Say that you gladly accept.

rows.label: qev042202_JNK0040
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev042202_SEL0041
rows.name: Say that you humbly accept.

rows.label: qev042202_JNK0050
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev042202_SEL0051
rows.name: Say that you eagerly accept.

rows.label: qev042202_MSG0012
rows.name: Divine Nopopon is happy that friend is happy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042202_MSG0013
rows.name: Yes, very good. Reverence of friend is duly noted.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042202_MSG0014
rows.name:
Oh ho! Divine Nopopon is eager to see how long
eagerness of friend lasts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042202_MSG0015
rows.name:
Now then! Trial is to refine this gemstone, which is
inscribed with ancient secret of Nopon origins.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042202_MSG0016
rows.name:
Friend must travel to each land and receive blessing
from other divine spirits there to make stone shimmer
and reveal said ancient secrets.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042202_JNK0060
rows.name: Inquire about Origins

rows.label: qev042202_SEL0061
rows.name:
Petition the Divine Nopopon to tell you
more about the origin of the Nopon.

rows.label: qev042202_JNK0070
rows.name: Inquire about Spirits

rows.label: qev042202_SEL0071
rows.name:
Petition the Divine Nopopon to tell you
more about these "other divine spirits."

rows.label: qev042202_MSG0017
rows.name:
It is said that by polishing this stone, one can read
how Nopon first came to be.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042202_MSG0018
rows.name: It is truth hidden even to Divine Nopopon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042202_MSG0019
rows.name:
Divine Nopopon is not only spirit here on Mira.
There are three others.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042202_MSG0020
rows.name:
All possess power equal to Divine Nopopon.
Perhaps even greater.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042202_MSG0021
rows.name:
There is power enough to overturn entire world,
should all four unite in purpose![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042202_MSG0022
rows.name: Divine Nopopon will entrust stone into care of friend.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042202_MSG0023
rows.name: First spirit dwells in Azure Lagoon of Oblivia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042202_MSG0024
rows.name: Second awaits in Old Ceremonial Hollow of Cauldros.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042202_MSG0025
rows.name:
And third spirit will be found in Quay Hollows
of Sylvalum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042202_MSG0026
rows.name:
Once friend has secured blessings of each one,
return here to Divine Nopopon. Friend can do it!
Rah rah rah![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042202_MSG0027
rows.name:
Friend has received final blessing?
Then show stone to Divine Nopopon![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042202_MSG0028
rows.name:
Oooooo! It shines with shiny luster never seen before!
Divine Nopopon can see something...
Yesss, it grows clearer...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042202_MSG0029
rows.name: This is ancient Nopon script![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042202_MSG0030
rows.name: I see... Ahhh, yes... Hmmm... Uhhh... Uh huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042202_JNK0100
rows.name: Press[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042202_SEL0101
rows.name: Urge the Divine Nopopon to tell you what it says.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042202_JNK0110
rows.name: Observe[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042202_SEL0111
rows.name:
Point out that the Divine Nopopon
doesn't sound very happy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042202_MSG0031
rows.name:
Divine Nopopon wishes friend would stop looking at
him with such sparkly and anticipating eyes...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042202_MSG0032
rows.name: This is, er...very difficult to say.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042202_MSG0033
rows.name: ...Friend picked up on that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042202_MSG0034
rows.name:
This was not quite tale that Divine Nopopon was
hoping for.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042202_MSG0035
rows.name:
Divine Nopopon thought it detailed how Nopon first
came to be born on this planet. Er, but instead, it is
just long list of Nopon-related...stuff.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042202_MSG0036
rows.name:
"Nopon must always be considered cute by all other
living things!"[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042202_MSG0037
rows.name: "Nopon must always preserve fluffiness of their fur!"[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042202_MSG0038
rows.name:
"Nopon must maximize fluffiness by drinking
keppo-carrot juice every day!"[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042202_MSG0039
rows.name: ...There are like 50 of these things.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042202_MSG0040
rows.name:
This is sort of dumb information Napopon would like.
But Divine Nopopon about ready to cry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042202_MSG0041
rows.name:
All it prove is that whatever ancestor left this behind
was big, dumb idiot. Ugh. Probably best for friend to
forget this ever happened.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042202_MSG0042
rows.name: ...Divine Nopopon will try to pull it together here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042202_MSG0043
rows.name:
Well, at least part about giving friend power of spirits
was true![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042202_MSG0044
rows.name: Nopo...nopo...nopopoPOPOPON![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042202_MSG0045
rows.name: And...TA DAAAAA![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042202_MSG0046
rows.name:
It may look like dumb toy, but it is actually REALLY
powerful![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042202_MSG0047
rows.name:
This sword of spirits could cleave even Divine Nopopon
in twain! Er, so watch where friend point it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042202_MSG0048
rows.name: And with that, role of Divine Nopopon is fulfilled.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042202_MSG0049
rows.name:
Divine Nopopon will probably never see friend again,
but keep that chin up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042202_MSG0050
rows.name:
Oh, and Divine Nopopon heard everything other spirits
said to friend.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042202_MSG0051
rows.name:
Time to go give them all hot helping of Legendary
Nopopopopon Slash X! HIYAAA![ST:wait ]
